name: Bokube Beta: WORLD 1: COLOR WORLD
description:
This is world 1 out of 8 of a full title in development Bokube. 

By reading this, you are being drafted (or come from my patron/kickstarter/agdg/v/) into playtesting the game and giving me feedback before the release later this year. 

If you have feedback please post a comment here, or email me at fredrick3377@gmail.com 

or just mention "Boku" or "BokuDev" or "Bokube" in your post and il find it and read it eventually. 

note: Its recommend you play it in a window encase any bugs arise you can quit the program easier. 

note 2: When you complete this build/world you will be sent back to the games tutorial so just know to quit out the program then. 

note 3: There may be audio issues as I am an amateur and just now learning how to do proper game audio, so feedback there is appreciated. 

Eventually all 8 worlds will be up for download as individual files/pages to test out, this beta will end sometime in April and the file pages will be deleted, and the game will get a month or two to make changes based on feedback or fix bugs for its final release on steam. 

-Thank you for testing-

-Fredrick 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

XBOX GAMEPAD CONTROLS (they aren't mentioned in-game yet) 

MOVE: Left Stick or D-PAD 

CAMERA: Left bumper/Right Bumper or just use right stick 

CAMERA UP/DOWN: (Pan the right stick up/down) 

CAMERA ZOOM: Y button 

JUMP: A button 

DASH: B button 

RESTART LEVEL: Back button
